    • Home Page
    • Home Store
    • Kitchen & Dining
    • Cutlery
    • Ginsu 14-Piece Cutlery Set

    Ginsu 14-Piece Cutlery Set
    Read Review (6) |   Write a review

     
     

    Here's a knife set that's a cut above the rest. Full tang blades and triple riveted, contoured handles make them extra strong and durable. Blades are stainless steel with a beveled edge for superior sharpness.

      Cutlery Set includes:
    • Six 4 1/2" serrated steak knives
    • 8" serrated chef's knife
    • 8" serrated slicer
    • 4 1/2" serrated utility knife
    • 7" Santoku knife
    • 3 1/2" paring knife
    • 5" boning knife
    • 8 1/2" all-purpose shears with bottle opener
    Black finish wood block (4 1/2" w x 8 1/2" h x 5 1/4" d). Dishwasher safe.

    Sign in to your Address Book.

    • Encino,California

    • This was just what I was looking for

    • Received a nice packaging and in good condition and they are just perfect and just the right sharpness for all kinds of cutting

    • not great quality

    • Flimsy, scissors do not work well

    • Date: July 27, 2014
    • Reviewer: Anonymous, 
    • Grafton, WV

    • Not worth what i paid

    • Missing a steak knife and is suppose to be stainless steel but blades have rust spots and are dull as can be from the get go.
      • Was this review helpful?
      • Yes
      • No
      • 0 of 0 people found this review helpful
    • Date: January 21, 2014
    • Reviewer: Anonymous, 
    • Mastic, NY

    • Thought it would be better

    • I opened this and noticed that I was missing 2 to 3 knives that were supposed to come with the set. I thought it was complete bull and the staff from seventh ave should check the merchandise before it is sent to people. This isn't the first time that this has happened to me. Ginsu knives are great but order them from Ginsu themselves not from second and third party services.
